title: Software Developer, India
description:
**At AlgoSec, what you do matters!**
 Over 2,200 of the world‚Äôs leading organizations trust AlgoSec to help secure their most critical workloads across public cloud, private cloud, containers, and on\\-premises networks.
   

  

 Join our global team, securing application connectivity, anywhere.
   

  

 We are hiring a Software Developer to join our Customer Focus R\\&D team.
   

  

**Reporting to:** 
 R\\&D Customer Focus Team Leader
   

  

**Location:** 
 Gurgaon, India
   

  

**Direct Employment**
**Responsibilities**
* Join a special and dynamic development team, solving complex issues seen in the field. Daily interaction with other development teams, technical services, and QA.
* Use profilers, debuggers, other tools and ‚Äúout of the box‚Äù thinking to improve component performance and scalability.
* Work with a wide range of technologies \\& systems such as Java, microservices, Spring, Perl, Linux, AWS infrastructure, Angular, PostgreSQL, ActiveMQ, and more.
* Become familiar with the entire AlgoSec suite and the underlying codebase while contributing to training and performing knowledge transfers within the company.


**Requirements**
* Graduated with an elite university (IIT, NIT) with excellence.
* Knowledge in software development (Java).
* At least 5 years of experience in Java software development.
* Team player, pleasant person to work with, high level of integrity.
* Fast learner, bright, independent and organized.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.


**Advantages**

* Knowledge in Linux/UNIX environments.

* Experience with full stack troubleshooting and providing support for enterprise applications.
* Experience in customer\\-facing roles, working with enterprise customers.
* Previous experience in the security space.

**About this opportunity**
 As a Full Stack Developer, you will work with a cross\\-functional agile team. Support existed and create new functionality from scratch, participate in architecture discussions, develop web applications following the up\\-to\\-date web standards, APIs and integrations.

* Build, evolve and maintain web applications for the world of digital dentistry.

**Applicant Privacy Policies**

 for additional information.

 At Align, we believe in the power of a smile, and we know that every smile is as unique as our employees. As we grow, we are committed to building a workforce rich in diverse cultural backgrounds and life experiences, fostering a culture of open\\-mindedness and compassion. We live our company values by promoting healthy people and healthy communities, all with the intent of changing millions of lives, one unique smile at a time.
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Statement**
 Align Technology is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunities in all our practices, without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, marital status, protected veteran status, age, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other legally protected category. title: Remote ReactJS Developer (5 yoe Reacts, 2800 USD, remote anywhere)
description:
If you cannot applied via linkedin please applied here: https://forms.gle/QEgqxTEQuX2v3km79
 



 Here is the JD:
 



  





**Our client** 




 They have been setting the standard for direct\\-to\\-home services technology for nearly 7 years and continue to lead innovation in an industry that provides services to hundreds of thousands of residents across the United States. People who come to work at the company are straight\\-talking, forward\\-thinking, hard workers who come together both to collaborate and to have a good time. Our client, the leader in the pest control industry, is looking for Software Engineers. Their SDEs are relied on to build the future of their direct\\-to\\-home service delivery platform. As a part of their Engineering department, this role requires the ability to move quickly, think deeply and work well with others on your Agile Scrum team: engineers, UX, product owners, and stakeholders. As a Senior Software Engineer, you will engineer, code, and test resilient, highly\\-scalable software systems for both their web applications as well as backend APIs for their mobile apps servicing their hundreds of thousands of customers. They are significantly building out the engineering teams and are seeking talented coders who love growth to be a part of this expansion.
 



**Responsibilities** 



* Develop high\\-quality, reusable, and maintainable React components for web applications.
* Collaborate closely with product managers, designers, and fellow developers to understand project requirements and deliver user\\-friendly interfaces.
* Lead and mentor junior developers, providing guidance, code reviews, and fostering best practices.
* Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues related to front\\-end development.
* Optimize applications for performance, responsiveness, and scalability.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date with React.js and related technologies, incorporating new features and best practices into our projects.
* Contribute to code reviews, ensuring code quality and adherence to coding standards.
* Have been comfortably using AI assistant tools in the SDLC process for at least 50% of the work for at least 3 months (e.g., ChatGPT, Gemini, GitHub Copilot, Cursor)



 Working hours: 8 pm \\- 2 am (GMT\\+7\\), Mon to Fri (with 2 additional flexible hours, total 8 hours / day)
 



 Method: online \\& remote
 



**Qualifications** 



* 5\\+ years of professional experience as a React.js developer, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
* Proficiency in React.js and a deep understanding of its core principles.
* Exceptional verbal English communication skills, enabling effective collaboration with international teams.
* Solid knowledge of web fundamentals, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
* Experience with state management libraries such as Redux or Mobx.
* Familiarity with front\\-end build tools and package managers (e.g., Webpack, npm, or Yarn).
* Strong understanding of responsive design and mobile\\-first development.
* Version control proficiency, particularly with Git.
* Experience with GraphQL and RESTful API integration is a plus.
* Knowledge of testing frameworks such as Jest or React Testing Library is a plus.
* Take self initiatives to learn more and integrate AI tools in every aspect of the work (e.g., ChatGPT, Gemini, GitHub Copilot, Cursor)



**Compensation package** 



* Salary upto 2800$
* No tax,insurance and benefit ( Only salary)



**Interview format** 




  





 Round 1: Initial Interview
 


* Length: 45 mins \\- 1 hour
* Agenda:
* Meet and greet
* Screening questions about your work experience
* Technical questions
* Live coding challenge (20\\-30 mins) via coderbyte.com
* Interviewer: Technical Recruiter



 Round 2: Client interview
 


* Length: 1 hour
* Agenda:
* Technical questions ( System design, Design pattern..)
* Live coding challenge on their platform
* Interviewer: US Technical Team

title: Machine Learning Research Intern
description:
**Length** 
 : 2 months
 



**Stipend** 
 : 80000/month
 



 Will strongly prefer hiring from IITs/IISc/BITS etc
 



 2025 or 2026 grads.
 



 Will be open if you already have a full\\-time offer but joining is at a later date
 



 Joining: Immediate
 



  





**About Tonks AI** 




 At Tonks AI, we generate high\\-quality sim\\-ready environments and scenarios to bridge the sim\\-to\\-real gap for autonomous systems. Our platform enables robotics teams to:
 



 Create realistic environments from text or image prompts Generate tailored scenarios automatically with our AI agent
 



  





**Role Description** 





 We are looking for a Machine Learning Research Intern with hands\\-on experience in creating AI pipelines with focus on mesh reconstruction and methods like Gaussian Splatting or NeRF. You will design, configure, and optimize these pipelines, and collaborate with our AI scenario\\-generation pipeline to ensure our customers can run robust, scalable simulations.
 




  





**Responsibilities** 



1. Study mesh reconstruction methods by reading research papers and their GitHub repositories
2. Build a pipeline to injest images and return models
3. Benchmark performance against different configurations and compute.
4. Optimize simulations for realism, scalability, and cloud deployment.



  





**Requirements** 



1. Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, or related fields. Preferably from IITs/BITS/IISc.
2. List of related projects and portfolio we could see.
3. Proficiency in Python
4. Desire to work in an early\\-stage startup.



  





**What We Offer** 




 Opportunity to work on the cutting edge of robotics simulation and AI.
 



 Work closely with founders from IIT Bombay and Microsoft Research backgrounds.

title: Full Stack Engineer -III
description:
**About Kapiva:** 




 Kapiva is a Series\\-B funded modern Ayurvedic nutrition brand, focused on bringing selectively sourced, natural foods to Indian consumers. Inculcating the wisdom of India's ancient food traditions, Kapiva's high\\-quality product range includes herbal juices, nutrition powders, ayurvedic gummies, healthy staples, and much more. Our products are top performers on online marketplaces such as Amazon, Flipkart and we're growing our presence offline in a big way (Nature's Basket, Reliance Retail, Noble Plus, etc).
 



  





**About Role:** 




 We are looking for a passionate and skilled Fullstack Engineer to join our growing engineering team. In this role, you will be instrumental in developing and maintaining our core web applications, ensuring a seamless and engaging experience for our customers. You will have the opportunity to work across the entire stack, contributing to both front\\-end and back\\-end development, and playing a key role in bringing new features and functionalities to life.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 




 ‚óè Develop and maintain robust, scalable, and high\\-performance web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and technologies.
 



 ‚óè Contribute to the entire software development lifecycle, from conceptualization and design to development, testing, deployment, and support.
 



 ‚óè Write clean, well\\-documented, and efficient code.
 



 ‚óè Collaborate closely with product managers, designers, and other engineers to understand requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
 



 ‚óè Implement responsive and user\\-friendly front\\-end interfaces.
 



 ‚óè Develop and integrate APIs for seamless communication between front\\-end and back\\-end systems.
 



 ‚óè Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and maintainability.
 



 ‚óè Troubleshoot and debug issues, identifying and implementing effective solutions.
 



 ‚óè Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies, contributing to continuous
 



 improvement of our tech stack.
 



  





**Required Skills and Experience:** 




 ‚óè 4\\-5 years of professional experience in fullstack web development.
 



 ‚óè Exceptional proficiency in JavaScript (ES6\\+).
 



 ‚óè Strong hands\\-on experience with Next.js or React.js (or similar modern JavaScript
 



 frameworks like Vue.js/Angular, with a strong willingness to adapt to Next.js/React.js).
 



 ‚óè Solid understanding of front\\-end development principles, including HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design.
 



 ‚óè Experience with Node.js and building RESTful APIs.
 



 ‚óè Familiarity with database technologies (e.g., MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL).
 



 ‚óè Understanding of version control systems, particularly Git.
 



 ‚óè Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team.
 



 ‚óè Strong problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail.
 



 ‚óè Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
 



  





**Bonus Points (Nice to Have):** 




 ‚óè Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
 



 ‚óè Familiarity with microservices architecture.
 



 ‚óè Knowledge of testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, React Testing Library).
 



 ‚óè Understanding of CI/CD pipelines.
 



 ‚óè Experience with e\\-commerce platforms or D2C businesses.
 



  





**Why Join Kapiva?** 




 ‚óè Opportunity to be part of a fast\\-growing D2C brand in the exciting Ayurvedic space.
 



 ‚óè Work on impactful projects that directly contribute to our customer experience and business growth.
 



 ‚óè Collaborative and supportive work environment.
 



 ‚óè Opportunities for learning, growth, and career advancement.
 



 ‚óè Competitive salary and benefits package.

title: Android Developer
description:
**THE JOB** 




  





 This is a
 **full\\-time, fully remote** 
 role for an Android Developer at Tarlton.io. You‚Äôll work from the comfort of your home while collaborating with a global team of engineers, designers, and strategists who are shaping platforms that serve millions of users.
 



 As an Android Developer, you‚Äôll be responsible for architecting and delivering next\\-generation mobile applications. You will play a key role in building products that integrate with large\\-scale infrastructures, dynamic data systems, and intelligent automation.
 



 Your day\\-to\\-day will include:
 


* Designing and developing Android applications from concept to deployment.
* Collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to define, design, and ship innovative features.
* Integrating APIs and backend services to support seamless app functionality.
* Troubleshooting, debugging, and continuously optimizing app performance.
* Staying on top of the latest Android trends, tools, and frameworks ‚Äî and implementing them to drive efficiency.



 At Tarlton.io, we value independence and accountability. You‚Äôll have the freedom to bring ideas to the table and the support of a team that‚Äôs building technologies meant to last.
 



  





**WHAT YOU NEED TO BRING TO THE TABLE** 




  




* Proven experience in
 **mobile application development** 
 for the Android platform.
* Strong knowledge of
 **Kotlin, Java, and Android SDK** 
 .
* Skilled in
 **mobile UI/UX best practices** 
 with an eye for clean, functional design.
* Solid foundation in
 **software development principles** 
 and lifecycle management.
* Excellent
 **problem\\-solving and debugging skills** 
 .
* Experience with
 **version control systems** 
 (Git preferred).
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (or equivalent real\\-world experience).
* Bonus: Familiarity with
 **AWS, REST APIs, Firebase** 
 , or large\\-scale cloud integrations.



  





**WHO WE ARE** 




  





 Tarlton Technologies (Tarlton.io) engineers advanced digital infrastructures that optimize performance, unify ecosystems, and drive scalable growth. From nationwide SEO platforms and AI\\-driven automation to enterprise\\-level web applications, we design and deploy intelligent solutions that solve real\\-world challenges. Our mission is to push the limits of digital scalability while delivering seamless, user\\-focused experiences.
 



 We‚Äôre not just building software, we‚Äôre engineering the future of online business. Every project we launch is designed to scale nationally, integrate with complex systems, and deliver results that matter. Joining Tarlton Technologies means becoming part of a forward\\-thinking team that values innovation, precision, and speed.
 



  





  





**WHY JOIN TARLTON.IO** 




  




* **Remote First:** 
 Work from anywhere with a team spread across the globe.
* **Impact at Scale:** 
 Build platforms that serve industries nationwide, not just small projects.
* **Innovation Culture:** 
 We prioritize automation, scalability, and AI\\-driven solutions.
* **Career Growth:** 
 Be part of a fast\\-growing tech company with opportunities to expand into leadership or specialized roles.
* **Team Energy:** 
 Work with motivated entrepreneurs, engineers, and designers who thrive on building what others say can‚Äôt be done.



  





 At Tarlton.io, you‚Äôre not just writing code, you‚Äôre helping engineer digital infrastructures that power the next decade of business. If you feel this would be a great role for you, submit your resume for consideration to work@tarlton.io

title: Senior Backend Developer - NodeJS, Typescript, RestAPI, AWS, NoSQL
description:
Position: Senior Backend Developer
 



 Experience Required: 5 to 9 Years
 



 Primary Skills: NodeJS, Typescript, RestAPI, AWS, NoSQL
 



 Secondary Skills: MySQL / PostgreSQL / NoSQL
 



 Work location: Bengaluru / Mumbai / Pune / Noida / Gurugram
 



  





  





**Key Responsibilities** 




 ‚óè Design, develop, and maintain RESTful APIs in NodeJS/Typescript (HapiJs/NestJs)
 



 ‚óè Work with databases (MySQL/NoSQL like MongoDB/Neo4j/Dynamodb/ElasticSearch) to build secure and optimized data access layers.
 



 ‚óè Ensure best practices in authentication, authorization, and data privacy (OAuth2\\.0, JWT, Auth0\\).
 



 ‚óè Collaborate with frontend teams (React/Angular) to define clear API contracts.
 



 ‚óè Optimize performance and scalability for high\\-volume donation and user interactions.
 



 ‚óè Write unit, integration, and end\\-to\\-end tests ensuring high code coverage and reliability.
 



 ‚óè Deploy, monitor, and troubleshoot applications in AWS using AWS CDK on ECS/Lambda/Serverless frameworks.
 



 ‚óè Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and technical design sessions.

 ‚óè Mentor junior developers and share best practices in clean coding, testing, and DevOps. Required
 



  





**Skills \\& Experience**

 ‚óè Strong knowledge of RDBMS (PostgreSQL/MySQL) and one NoSQL database (MongoDB, DynamoDB, Neo4j).
 



 ‚óè Hands\\-on experience with AWS or GCP services (ECS, Lambda, S3, Cloud Functions, Pub/Sub, SQS/Kafka).
 



 ‚óè Solid understanding of API security, rate limiting, token validation, and encryption.
 



 ‚óè Familiarity with event\\-driven architectures and message queues.
 



 ‚óè Experience with CI/CD pipelines and Dockerized deployments.
 



 ‚óè Strong problem\\-solving, debugging, and performance optimization skills.
 



 ‚óè Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with an ability to work in cross\\-functional teams.

title: Sr QA Automation (Selenium & Java)
description:
**Job Title: Sr QA Automation (Selenium \\& JAVA)
   

  

 Location: Remote ‚Äì India**
**Client Domain:** 
 Product\\-based company specializing in SaaS HRMS (Human Resource Management System) applications tailored for public sector organizations
   

  

**Job Summary**
 We are seeking a
 **seasoned Senior QA Engineer** 
 with a strong background in
 **both automation and manual testing** 
 , with proven expertise in
 **Selenium WebDriver** 
 and
 **Java\\-based test automation** 
 . This role is pivotal to ensuring the quality and reliability of our SaaS\\-based HRMS solutions. The ideal candidate will be responsible for leading QA efforts, driving test strategy, building scalable automation frameworks, and contributing to a high\\-quality Agile development environment.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Lead the end\\-to\\-end automation testing efforts using Selenium WebDriver with Java, and support key initiatives across manual testing workflows.
* Design, develop, and maintain robust, reusable test automation frameworks for web applications.
* Create and execute comprehensive test plans, test cases, and manual/automated scripts ensuring maximum coverage.
* Identify, isolate, and thoroughly document bugs, collaborating closely with developers for timely resolution.
* Integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins/GitHub Actions) and work closely with DevOps to streamline deployments.
* Perform cross\\-browser and cross\\-platform testing using tools such as BrowserStack or Sauce Labs.
* Conduct API testing (manual and automated) using Postman, RestAssured, or similar tools.
* Support performance testing efforts (using tools like JMeter) to ensure optimal application behavior under load.
* Champion best practices in BDD/TDD, test data management, defect reporting, and test metrics tracking.
* Actively contribute to Agile ceremonies (daily stand\\-ups, sprint planning, retrospectives, demos).
* Stay updated on emerging test tools and technologies to improve QA strategy and implementation.
* Mentor junior QA engineers and ensure QA standards are consistently met across projects.


**Required Skills \\& Qualifications**
* 7\\+ years of experience in Software QA, with at least 3\\+ years in Selenium WebDriver automation using Java.
* Expertise in Java programming with strong OOP principles, especially in building automation scripts and frameworks.
* Solid hands\\-on experience with test automation frameworks: TestNG, JUnit, and BDD tools like Cucumber.
* Strong command of manual testing techniques, including exploratory, regression, functional, and integration testing.
* Proficiency with CI/CD tools: Jenkins, Git, Docker.
* Experience with API testing and validation using Postman, RestAssured, or similar tools.
* Knowledge of performance testing tools like JMeter is a strong plus.
* Experience testing in cloud\\-based or virtual test environments (BrowserStack, Sauce Labs, etc.).
* Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and DevOps practices.
* Strong analytical mindset with attention to detail and excellent problem\\-solving skills.
* Exceptional communication skills and ability to work collaboratively with cross\\-functional teams.

title: AI Agent Developer | Freelance | WFH
description:
**About BeGig** 




 BeGig is the leading tech freelancing marketplace. We empower innovative, early\\-stage, non\\-tech founders to bring their visions to life by connecting them with top\\-tier freelance talent. By joining BeGig, you‚Äôre not just taking on one role‚Äîyou‚Äôre signing up for a platform that will continuously match you with high\\-impact opportunities tailored to your expertise.
 



  





**Your Opportunity** 




 Join our network as an
 **AI Agent Developer** 
 and help define the future of intelligent systems. This role places you at the forefront of autonomous AI workflows, where your contributions directly enable businesses to automate complex tasks through intelligent agents and retrieval\\-augmented generation (RAG) pipelines.
 



 Plus, enjoy the flexibility to structure your engagement on an hourly or project basis, all while working remotely.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




 As an AI Agent Developer, you will:
 


* **Design Intelligent Agents** 
 : Build and fine\\-tune autonomous agents using LangChain and agentic AI frameworks.
* **Develop RAG Pipelines** 
 : Create and implement retrieval\\-augmented generation pipelines for contextual response generation.
* **Integrate APIs** 
 : Seamlessly integrate external APIs for dynamic agent interaction and task execution.

 : Deploy, monitor, and optimize agents on cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure using scalable infrastructure.

 : Work with cross\\-functional teams to design, test, and improve AI\\-driven workflows and systems.



  





**Technical Requirements \\& Skills** 



* **Experience**

* **Cloud Infrastructure**

* **API Integrations** 
 : Solid understanding of RESTful and GraphQL APIs for workflow orchestration.
* **Applied AI Systems** 
 : Familiarity with RAG concepts, embeddings, and multi\\-step agent design.



  





**What We‚Äôre Looking For** 



* An AI engineer who understands the architecture and lifecycle of autonomous agents.
* A freelancer who thrives in a remote, flexible work environment with the ability to manage multiple agent\\-based projects.
* A builder who is excited to push boundaries with modern AI tools and frameworks.



  





**Why Join Us?** 



* **Immediate Impact**

* **Remote \\& Flexible** 
 : Structure your commitment on an hourly or project basis‚Äîwork from anywhere.
* **Future Opportunities** 
 : BeGig‚Äôs ecosystem ensures you stay matched with relevant, AI\\-first engineering roles.
* **Growth \\& Recognition** 
 : Be part of a collaborative environment that values innovation, contribution, and continuous learning.

description:
üå•Ô∏è GCP Cloud Engineer Internship
 



 Company: DC InfoTech Pvt. Ltd.
 



 Location: Palghar, Maharashtra (Remote)
 



 Duration: 3 Months
 



 Start Date: 15 September 2025
 



 Type: Unpaid
 



  





 üöÄ About Us
 



 DC InfoTech Pvt. Ltd. is an MSME\\-recognized startup and a proud member of the Google for Startups program. We are also an official Google Cloud Service Partner in India.
 



 We specialize in cloud migration, application modernization, and AI\\-driven solutions. Our mission is to empower businesses to scale securely and efficiently using Google Cloud technologies.
 



  





 Our expertise spans:
 


* Cloud infrastructure
* Serverless solutions
* Training programs
* Custom software development tailored to startups and enterprises



  





 With a growing suite of in\\-house tools like Verbi AI, we combine innovation with performance to help clients achieve their digital transformation goals.

title: AlgoNext Automation Developer, India
description:
At AlgoSec, What you do matters!
   

  

 Over 2,200 of the world‚Äôs leading organizations trust AlgoSec to help secure their most critical workloads across public cloud, private cloud, containers, and on\\-premises networks.
   

  

 Join our global team, securing application connectivity, anywhere.
   

  

 We are hiring a QA Automation Developer to join our global team working in an agile environment.
   

  

**Reporting to:** 
 Automation Team Leader
   

  

**Location:** 
 Gurgaon, India (Hybrid/Remote)
   

  

**Direct employment**
**Responsibilities**
* Plan, write and execute E2E automatic tests for complex features using java and RestAssured.
* Perform testing for AlgoSec new SaaS product, working with multiple cloud vendors as AWS, Azure and GCP
* Running tests in CI/CD environment.


**Requirements**
* BSc in Computer Science/Engineering.
* At least 3 years of experience in object\\-oriented programming: Java.
* At least 2 years of experience in developing complex automation tests using TestNG, RestAssured (Java).
* Experience in manual QA testing (ability to write your own test before automation)
* Experience working with at least one cloud provider (AWS/Azure/GCP)
* Multitasking and problem\\-solving abilities, context switching and "out\\-of\\-the\\-box" thinking abilities.
* Team player, pleasant and with a high level of integrity.
* Very organized, thorough, and devoted.
* Bright, fast learner, independent.
* Good written and verbal communication skills in English.


**Advantages**
* Experience in QA of network security software products.
* Experience in developing complex automation tests using selenium (Java).
* Experience in testing SaaS applications.


 AlgoSec is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EEO), committed to creating a friendly, diverse and inclusive company culture.

title: QA Agile Testers
description:
At Fluor, we are proud to design and build projects and careers. We are committed to fostering a welcoming and collaborative work environment that encourages big\\-picture thinking, brings out the best in our employees, and helps us develop innovative solutions that contribute to building a better world together. If this sounds like a culture you would like to work in, you‚Äôre invited to apply for this role.
   

  

 QA Agile Testers
   

  

 Fluor is hiring a highly skilled and detail\\-oriented
 **Agile QA Tester** 
 with 6\\+ years of experience in testing web applications. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both manual and automated testing, with hands\\-on expertise in Selenium and experience working with onshore/offshore team models. You will play a key role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our software products through rigorous testing and collaboration with cross\\-functional teams.Work location ‚Äì Vadodara, Fluor India office. This is an office position. Candidates must be able to overlap the EST time zone for 3\\-4 hours (until noon EST) on working days. Position is a 12\\-month contract with the option of extending it to the long term for the right candidate.
   

  

**Roles And Responsibilities**
* Manage multiple project schedules at different phases of testing, and ability to prioritize.
* Design, develop, and execute test plans and test cases for web applications.
* Perform manual testing to identify bugs, usability issues, and performance bottlenecks.
* Collaborate with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and ensure test coverage.
* Document and report defects clearly and track them through resolution.
* Demonstrate the results to Product Owner and other stakeholders for sign\\-off on user stories.
* Participate as an active team member in agile team meetings including planning, sizing, daily SCRUM, and retrospective meetings.


 Basic Job Requirements
   

  

* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science, engineering or relevant field (Preferred)
* Minimum 6 years of experience in software testing, with a focus on web applications.
* Strong experience in functional, regression, integration, and exploratory testing.
* Proficiency with test automation frameworks such as TestNG or Junit.
* Strong experience programming languages such as Java, Java Script (C\\# is a plus).
* Strong ability to write and optimize SQL queries using relational database MySQL.
* Strong Experience with test management and defect tracking tools (e.g., JIRA, DevOps).
* Understanding CI/CD pipelines and integration with Jenkins, GitHub CI, or Azure DevOps.


**Other Job Requirements**
 Preferred Qualifications
   

  

* Experience with API testing tools such as Postman or ReadyAPI
* Knowledge of performance testing tools (e.g., JMeter, LoadRunner).
* ISTQB or equivalent certification is a plus.


**To Be Considered Candidates**
 Must be authorized to work in the country where the position is located.
   

  

 We are an equal opportunity employer. All qualified individuals will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, religion, national origin, disability, veteran status, genetic information, or any other criteria protected by governing law.
   

  

**Notice To Candidates**
 Background checks are carried out as part of any conditional offer made, including (but not limited to \\& role dependent) education, professional registration, employment, references, passport verifications and Global Watchlist screening.
